subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Vincenzo Nibali of Italy won the Giro d’Italia’s first serious mountain stage by attacking on a descent Saturday, while David Arroyo Durán of Spain moved into the over all lead.
snippet: Vincenzo Nibali of Italy won the Giro d’Italia’s first serious mountain stage by attacking on a descent Saturday, while David Arroyo Durán of Spain moved into the over all lead.
